content: As you approach the entrance to the village, you can spot two paths - a main one directly ahead, and a side path leading to the left down some stairs. You can also check out a small stream to the right with more plants to harvest in and around the water, and a green Wisp to absorb (it's guarded by another Puppet Spider).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
As you approach the entrance to the village, you can spot two paths - a main one directly ahead, and a side path leading to the left down some stairs. You can also check out a small stream to the right with more plants to harvest in and around the water, and a green Wisp to absorb (it's guarded by another Puppet Spider).
